description:
I've given ssh config path in options>terminal as ~/.ssh/config
but did nothing. 

getting this error

   Unable to push to 'origin' - ERROR: You're using an RSA key with SHA-1, which is no longer allowed. Please use a newer client or a different key type.
Please see https://github.blog/2021-09-01-improving-git-protocol-security-github/ for more information.
summary: It amazing but can't push to github :(

description: Great clean interface. Very nice history graph. Effective display of Diff and modified files. Commit hunks and single lines. And last, but not less important, it manages to do it all in a single window. I've tried most popular free git clients for Linux and this one is above all of them.
summary: Best free git manager for Linux!

description: I've used the original version, GitAhead, before now switching to the Gittyup fork. It's just as awesome for understanding who did what, when, and how. It's also awesome for making lots of small, useful commits out of a big diff. I can very much recommend it.

summary: Seems nice, but is not working

description: Parece una aplicación muy completa, aunque me gustaría que la interfaz fuera algo más limpia.
summary: Cumple su tarea, aunque la interfaz es algo caótica
